adverbs.description: widely (comparative widelier or more widely, superlative wideliest or most widely)

entries.meaning: In a wide manner; across a wide area.
(figurative) Commonly; generally; to a great degree.
examples: In 1866 Colonel J. F. Meline noted that the rebozo had almost disappeared in Santa Fe and that hoop skirts, on sale in the stores, were being widely used.
